p: The ability of the most active compounds 5 and 6 to enhance gamma radiation-induced tumor cell death was examined. The results proved the ability of the two compounds to sensitize the cancerous cells to the lethal effects of ionizing radiation ( Table 3). Compounds 5 and 6 showed enhanced cytotoxicity on all cell lines after irradiation with a single dose of 8 Gy gamma radiation. Compound 5 was more potent on all the tested cell lines with IC 50 < 5 µM.
